text:
I get this:
```ERROR: cannot find name corresponding to UUID 10745b16-79ce-11e8-11f9-7d13ad32a3b2 in a registry```
which is the `Statistics` package that I have as a dependency somewhere. Did anything change and I missed out?

elements.text: ERROR: cannot find name corresponding to UUID 10745b16-79ce-11e8-11f9-7d13ad32a3b2 in a registry
package that I have as a dependency somewhere. Did anything change and I missed out?

text: I don't think anything changed. It seems like there might be a problem with the registry. You could try something like `pkg> registry rm General; registry add General; instantiate`

elements.text: I don't think anything changed. It seems like there might be a problem with the registry. You could try something like
pkg> registry rm General; registry add General; instantiate

text:
```shell> rm -rf ~/.julia/registries/General
(@v1.4) pkg> registry add General; instantiate
    Cloning registry from "<https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General.git>"
      Added registry `General` to `~/.julia/registries/General`

(@v1.4) pkg> add FourierFlows
   Updating registry at `~/.julia/registries/General`
   Updating git-repo `<https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General.git>`
  Resolving package versions...
ERROR: cannot find name corresponding to UUID 10745b16-79ce-11e8-11f9-7d13ad32a3b2 in a registry

julia> versioninfo()
Julia Version 1.4.2
Commit 44fa15b150* (2020-05-23 18:35 UTC)
Platform Info:
  OS: macOS (x86_64-apple-darwin19.6.0)
  CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9750H CPU @ 2.60GHz
  WORD_SIZE: 64
  LIBM: libopenlibm
  LLVM: libLLVM-8.0.1 (ORCJIT, skylake)
Environment:
  JULIA_NUM_THREADS = 12```
